package.name: Dependency Parsed Treebank
package.license: This is the 10% selection of the WSJ section of Penn Treebank, (C) LDC 1995, available for use in the NLTK, but parsed into a dependency parsing format using Yamada's treebank converter (http://www.jaist.ac.jp/~h-yamada/). Whereas this converter will list the root (the head of the sentence, and not a dummy root symbol) as having index 1, these have been modified to match CoNLL format (http://nextens.uvt.nl/~conll/example.html) where the root has index 0. Use of this data must obey all conditions applicable to the LDC corpus it is build from, and is for non-commercial use only.
